sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <cus-filter-wraper>
      <el-form  style="margin: 20px 0 0 0"  label-position="right" label-width="auto" >
        <el-row  :gutter="10">
          <cus-col :span="6">
            <el-form-item :label="$t('bomCreate.name')" prop>
              <el-input
                :placeholder="$t('bomCreate.name')"
                class="filter-item"
                clearable
                v-model="params.like_name"
              ></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col :span="6">
            <el-form-item :label="$t('bomCreate.bomLevel')" prop>
              <el-input type="number" placeholder v-model="params.eq_bomLevel"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-col :span="6">
            <el-form-item :label="$t('bomCreate.business')" prop>
              <cus-select :codetype="'ibrmsbusiness'" placeholder v-model="params.eq_business"></cus-select>
            </el-form-item>
          </cus-col>
          <cus-btn-wrapper>
            <el-button  size="mini"
              v-waves
              type="primary"
              @click="handleSearch"
              class="filter-button"
              icon="el-icon-search"
            >
              {{
              $t('table.search') }}
            </el-button>
          </cus-btn-wrapper>
        </el-row>
        <el-row :gutter="10">
             <cus-col :span="10">
                <el-button size="mini"
              v-waves
              type="primary"
              v-auth="'rule-bom:add'"
              @click="handleDownloadWithSelect"
              icon="el-icon-download"
              class="filter-button"
            >{{$t('bomCreate.downloadSelect') }}</el-button>
            <el-button  size="mini"
              v-waves
              type="primary"
              v-auth="'rule-bom:add'"
              @click="handleDownloadWithAll"
              icon="el-icon-download"
              class="filter-button"
            >{{$t('bomCreate.downloadAll') }}</el-button>
             </cus-col>
        </el-row>
      </el-form>
    </cus-filter-wraper>
    <cus-table-title :label="$t('bomCreate.tableName')"></cus-table-title>
    <el-table
      @selection-change="handleSelectionChange"
      :data="configs"
      size="mini"
      fit
      element-loading-text="Loading"
      border
      highlight-current-row
      align="center"
      class="wraper-table"
      ref="page"
    >
      <el-table-column type="selection" width="55"></el-table-column>
     <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')"  align="center" sortable type="index" width="60px">
         <template v-slot="scope">
                              {{ initTableIndex('page', scope.$index) }}
         </template>
     </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('bom.name')"  prop="name" align="center"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('bom.cnName')"  prop="cnName" align="center"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        :label="$t('bom.fatherBom')"
        :formatter="fatherBomFormat"
        prop="fatherBom"
        align="center"
      ></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        :label="$t('bom.localItem')"
        :formatter="localItemFormat"
        prop="localItem"
        align="center"
      ></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        :label="$t('bom.fatherItem')"
        :formatter="fatherItemFormat"
        prop="fatherItem"
        align="center"
      ></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('bom.bomLevel')"  prop="bomLevel" align="center"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        :label="$t('bom.business')"
        :formatter="businessFormat"
        prop="business"
        align="center"
      ></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('bom.source')" :width="300" prop="source" align="center"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        :label="$t('bom.valid')"
        :formatter="validFormat"
        prop="valid"
        align="center"
      ></el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <!-- 分页 -->
    <cus-pagination
      ref="page"
      url="/rule-bom/list"
      :pageSize="10"
      :params="params"
      v-model="configs"
    />
  </cus-wraper>
</template>
<script>
import { createBOMBySelected, createBomByAll,getAllFatherBomAndFatherBomItem } from "@/api/ibrms/ruleBom";
import { mapGetters } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "bomCreate",
  data() {
    return {
      checkAll: false,
      //表格数据
      configs: [],
      checkedCities: [],
      //查询参数
      params: {
        eq_id: "",
        like_name: "",
        like_cnName: "",
        eq_valid: "",
        eq_business: "",
        eq_bomLevel:""
      },
      computed: {
        ...mapGetters(["ldcodes"])
      },
      multipleSelection: [],
      //检验规则
      rules: {
        userCode: [
          { required: true, message: this.$t("ruleBom.xxx"), trigger: "blur" }
        ]
      },
      dialogVisible: false, //dialog显示还是隐藏
      dialogStatus: "", //表单状态是新增还是修改
      validArray: [],
      businessArray: [],
      fatherBomOptions: [],
      fatherItemOptions: [],
      localItemOptions: [],
      bomData: {
        bomList: [],
        itemList: []
      },
    };
  },
  computed: {},
  created() {
    let ldcodes = this.$store.state.ldcode.ldcodes;
    this.businessArray = ldcodes["ibrmsbusiness"];
    this.validArray = ldcodes["ibrmsvalid"];
    this.initFatherBomAndFatherBomItemLists();
  },
  methods: {
    handleSearch() {
      this.$refs.page.reload();
    },
    handleDownloadWithSelect() {
      if (this.multipleSelection.length > 0 && this.multipleSelection != null) {
        this.$notify({
          title: this.$t("bomCreate.prompt"),
          message: this.$t("bomCreate.downloadInfo"),
          type: "success",
          duration: 2000
        });
        createBOMBySelected(this.multipleSelection)
          .then(response => {
            //console.log(response);
            // let blob = new Blob([response], {
            //     type: 'application/octet-stream'
            // })
            // console.log(blob);
            let fileName = "BOM.zip";
            // if(window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob){
            //     navigator.msSaveBlob(blob, fileName);
            // }else{
            //     var link = document.createElement('a');
            //     link.href = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob)
            //     link.download = fileName
            //     link.click();
            //     window.URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href)
            // }
            this.downloadResponseFile(response, fileName);
            this.notifySuccess(this.$t("bomCreate.downloadSuccessful"));
          })
          .catch(error => {
            this.$notify({
              title: this.$t("bomCreate.error"),
              message: this.$t("bomCreate.downloadFailed"),
              type: "error",
              duration: 2000
            });
            console.log(error);
          });
      } else {
        this.$notify({
          title: this.$t("bomCreate.error"),
          message: this.$t("bomCreate.pleaseSelectBOM"),
          type: "error",
          duration: 2000
        });
      }
    },
    handleDownloadWithAll() {
      console.log("download all");
      this.$notify({
        title: this.$t("bomCreate.pleaseSelectBOM"),
        message: this.$t("bomCreate.downloadingAll"),
        type: "success",
        duration: 2000
      });
      createBomByAll()
        .then(response => {
          // let blob = new Blob([response], {
          //   type: 'application/octet-stream'
          // })
          // console.log(blob);
          let fileName = "BOM.zip";
          // if(window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob){
          //   navigator.msSaveBlob(blob, fileName);
          // }else{
          //   var link = document.createElement('a');
          //   link.href = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob)
          //   link.download = fileName
          //   link.click();
          //   window.URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href)
          // }
          this.downloadResponseFile(response, fileName);
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t("bomCreate.downloadSuccessful"));
        })
        .catch(error => {
          this.$notify({
            title: this.$t("bomCreate.error"),
            message: this.$t("bomCreate.downloadFailed"),
            type: "error",
            duration: 2000
          });
        });
    },
    handleSelectionChange(val) {
      console.log("select change");
      this.multipleSelection = val;
      console.log(this.multipleSelection);
    },
    resetForm() {
      this.form = {
        //表单数据与后端实体类对应
        id: "", //主键ID
        xxxx: ""
      };
    },
    validFormat(row, column) {
      let code = row.valid;
      let stateValue = "";
      this.validArray.forEach((st, index) => {
        if (st.code === code) {
          stateValue = st.codename;
        }
      });
      return stateValue;
    },
    businessFormat(row, column) {
      let code = row.business;
      let stateValue = "";
      this.businessArray.forEach((st, index) => {
        if (st.code === code) {
          stateValue = st.codename;
        }
      });
      return stateValue;
    },
    fatherBomFormat(row, column) {
      let bomId = row.fatherBom;
      let stateValue = "";
      this.bomData.bomList.forEach((st, index) => {
        if (st.id === bomId) {
          stateValue = st.name;
        }
      });
      return stateValue;
    },
    localItemFormat(row, column) {
      let itemId = row.localItem;
      let stateValue = "";
      this.bomData.itemList.forEach((st, index) => {
        if (st.id === itemId) {
          stateValue = st.name;
        }
      });
      return stateValue;
    },
    fatherItemFormat(row, column) {
      let itemId = row.fatherItem;
      let stateValue = "";
      this.bomData.itemList.forEach((st, index) => {
        if (st.id === itemId) {
          stateValue = st.name;
        }
      });
      return stateValue;
    },
     initFatherBomAndFatherBomItemLists() {
      getAllFatherBomAndFatherBomItem().then(res => {
        this.bomData = res.data;
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
</style>
